block.label: Logistics

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

block.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS. USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS AND IMAGES.
LET’S BEGIN…

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: Which of the following best describes how you identify?

select.label: S_GroceryShop
select.title: How much of the household grocery shopping do you, yourself do?

radio.label: S_City
radio.title: Which city do you reside in?

checkbox.label: S_Category
checkbox.title: Which of the following products, if any, have you purchased and used in the past 3 months?

radio.label: S_Frequency
radio.title: How often have you purchased products in each of the following categories?

checkbox.label: S_CategoryPurchased
checkbox.title: Which of the following products, if any, have you purchased and consumed in the past 6 months?

checkbox.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased1
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of Clutter Category 1 have you purchased in the past 6 months?

radio.label: S_Brand_BUMO1
radio.title: And which one brand of Clutter Category 1 have you purchased most often in the past 6 months?

checkbox.label: S_Brand_NonRejecter1
checkbox.title: Please select the brand(s) of Clutter Category 1 that you would NOT consider purchasing in the future.

checkbox.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased2
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of [pipe: Category] have you purchased in the past 6 months?

radio.label: S_Brands_BUMO2
radio.title: And which one brand of [pipe: Category] have you purchased most often in the past 6 months?

checkbox.label: S_Brands_Rejecter2
checkbox.title: Please select the brand(s) of [pipe: Category] that you would NOT consider purchasing in the future.

autofill.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased
autofill.title: Usage Past purchased (P3M, P6M, P12M) - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

autofill.label: S_Brand_BUMO
autofill.title: BUMO - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

checkbox.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased3
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of Clutter Category 2 have you purchased in the past 6 months?

radio.label: S_Brand_BUMO3
radio.title: And which one brand of Clutter Category 2 have you purchased most often in the past 6 months?

checkbox.label: S_Brand_NonRejecter3
checkbox.title: Please select the brand(s) of Clutter Category 2 that you would NOT consider purchasing in the future.

radio.label: S_Stores
radio.title: Where do you typically buy xxxx?
radio.row: At a physical store only (like a pharmacy, grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Both online and at a store

radio.label: S_Store_EComm
radio.title: Where do you typicall buy [pipe: Category]
radio.row: At a physical store only (like a pharmacy, grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Mostly online and occasionally at a physical store
Mostly at a physical store and occasionally online
Both online and at a physical store equally

checkbox.label: S_Devices
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought [pipe: Category] online, what devices do you use to shop for [pipe: Category] online?

checkbox.label: S_OnlineStores
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought [pipe: Category] online, where specifically?
checkbox.row: Large online retailer (e.g. Amazon, Ebay, Alibaba, Ocado etc.)
Supermarket apps & websites (e.g. Walmart, Tesco, Carrefour etc.)
Specialized online shops (e.g. pet supplies, hardware stores etc.)

checkbox.label: S_Delivery
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought [pipe: Category] online, where specifically?
checkbox.row: Large online retailer (e.g. Amazon, Ebay, Alibaba, Ocado etc.)
Supermarket apps & websites (e.g. Walmart, Tesco, Carrefour etc.)
Specialized online shops (e.g. pet supplies, hardware stores etc.)

block.label: Quotas
block.exec: if PhaseQ.r1: Phase.val=0 if PhaseQ.r2: Phase.val=1 if PhaseQ.r3: Phase.val=2

radio.label: Phase
radio.title: Phase

survey.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

radio.label: RedHerringCheck
radio.title: Which of the following is not a color?

block.label: Snapshot
block.builder:title: Snapshot Exercise

radio.label: S_SnapshotOptIn
radio.title:
We need your help, please! We are trying to understand how people like you shop for [pipe: Category].
For this research only, we would greatly appreciate if you could share your past 90-day web browsing data. No personal details or products purchased will be collected, and you will receive an additional incentive.
This will only take one minute of your time. All we need to do is download a temporary plugin to your computer, collect your past 90-day web browsing data, and then the plugin will delete itself immediately after.
Would you like to proceed? Thanks in advance for your help!

block.html: Redirect placeholder so that the redirect executes

number.label: RedirectState_Desktop
number.title: Desktop: Redirect State

text.label: RespInfo
text.title: Please fill in the following information below:

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
Congratulations!
• Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
• You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
• You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
• You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
• Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

block.label: S1_Attitudinal
block.builder:title: Section 1 – COVID, Pre-Shop Research, & Retailer Driver
block.html: For the following questions, please think about your most recent purchase of [pipe: Category], [pipe: Type] at [pipe: Retailer].

radio.label: PreShopRetailer1
radio.title: How frequently do you shop for [pipe: Category] today compared to before the COVID pandemic?

radio.label: PreShopRetailer2
radio.title: How frequently do you shop for [pipe: Category] [pipe: Type] today compared to before the COVID pandemic?

radio.label: PreShopRetailer3
radio.title: Once the COVID pandemic is over, how frequently will you shop for [pipe: Category] [pipe: Type] compared to today?

radio.label: PreShopRetailer4
radio.title: Has COVID impacted your choice to shop at [pipe: Retailer]?

checkbox.label: PreShopRetailer5
checkbox.title: Please select all the reasons you shop for [pipe: Category] at [pipe: Retailer].
checkbox.row: Carries my preferred brand(s) or product(s)
Product(s) I want are always in stock
Easy to find what I am looking for
Convenience, I do other shopping here
I am a member of their loyalty program
My shopping list/ prior purchases are saved
Provides product ratings and reviews that I find helpful

radio.label: PreShopRetailer6
radio.title: Did you conduct any research about [pipe: Category] (such as looking at ratings, reviews, prices or product information) before your most recent purchase?

checkbox.label: PreShopRetailer7
checkbox.title: Where did you research?

checkbox.label: PreShopRetailer8
checkbox.title: More specifically, where did you research online?

checkbox.label: PreShopRetailer9
checkbox.title: And what did you look at when researching online?
checkbox.row: Seek out additional information about a product

checkbox.label: PreShopRetailer10
checkbox.title: What did you do when researching at the physical store?
checkbox.row: Look for information on the packaging
Look for information on the merchandising display

block.label: S2_Attitudinal
block.builder:title: Section 2 - Category Drivers
block.html: For the following questions, please think about your most recent purchase of [pipe: Category], [pipe: Type] at [pipe: Retailer].

radio.label: CatDriver1
radio.title: How important are the following considerations when purchasing [pipe: Category]?
radio.row: Fragrance (intensity of fragrance, strong or light)

block.label: S3_Attitudinal
block.builder:title: Section 3 - Shopping Behavior
block.html: For the following questions, please think about your most recent purchase of [pipe: Category], [pipe: Type] at [pipe: Retailer].

radio.label: ShopBehave1
radio.title: What was the purpose of your overall shopping trip, in which you purchased [pipe: Category]...?
radio.row: I needed to get one or two specific items
I needed to get a few “fill in” items in between larger shopping trips
I needed to get many items as part of a large shopping trip
I didn’t really need anything, but something grabbed my attention and I ended up shopping

radio.label: ShopBehave2
radio.title: Was this purchase of [pipe: Category]...?
radio.row: To have on hand for when the need may arise

radio.label: ShopBehave3
radio.title: Did you decide to purchase [pipe: Category] before you started shopping OR once you were already shopping?

radio.label: ShopBehave4
radio.title: What did you do while shopping?
radio.row: Read an article or blog online
Read an article on a print newspaper or magazine
Look for coupons or promotions online at a third-party website
Look for coupons or promotions on the retailer website
Watch an online video about the product
Use a search engine (e.g., Google) to look up the product
Look at product details online on product page
Filter by price or best sellers
Look for information on the packaging
Look for information on the merchandising display

radio.label: ShopBehave5
radio.title: How did you find the [pipe: Category]?
radio.row: By using the department/ category menu
By typing into the search bar
It was right on the retailer’s homepage
By going on my “previously bought items” list
By going on the coupons/ deals section
It was an item I have as a Subscribe & Save/ Auto-Shipment
There was an ad for the product on the site

radio.label: ShopBehave6
radio.title: Which statement best describes your brand selection for [pipe: Category]?
radio.row: I knew what brand(s) I would buy before shopping
I had another brand(s) in mind when I started shopping, but chose a different brand instead
I had multiple brands in mind and made up my mind while shopping
I was not thinking of any brands and made up my mind while shopping

checkbox.label: ShopBehave7
checkbox.title: Please select all the reasons you chose to buy this brand.
checkbox.row: Was recommended by a friend/ family member
Was recommended to me by online retailer
Saw a billboard or similar advertisement
Saw an ad online (e.g., banner ad on website, ad on social media)
Was recommended on a TV program or TV celebrity endorsement
Saw information about the product on social media
Saw the product or product packaging in-store

checkbox.label: ShopBehave8
checkbox.title: What would influence you to try a new brand/product?

block.label: PostPurchase
block.builder:title: Section 4 - Post Purchase
block.html: For the following questions, please think about your most recent purchase of [pipe: Category], [pipe: Type] at [pipe: Retailer].

checkbox.label: PostPurchase1
checkbox.title: Where do you plan to use this [pipe: Category] product?

checkbox.label: PostPurchase2
checkbox.title: When purchasing home fragrance/ air freshening products in the past 3 months, you did not purchase any aromatherapy products, specifically. Why is that?
checkbox.row: I have purchased aromatherapy products in the past, but didn’t need any in the past 3 months
I have purchased aromatherapy products in the past, but do not use them anymore
I cannot find them in the stores I shop
I don’t understand how to use them

block.label: Class

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.

select.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY
select.title: Which of the following best describes you?
select.choice: Black or African American, or Black British

checkbox.label: STANDARD_ETHNICITY2
checkbox.title: Please select all of the following that describe you.
checkbox.row: Black or African American, or Black British

block.note: STANDARD HISPANIC is going to be removed

select.label: STANDARD_HISPANIC
select.title: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?
select.choice: No , not of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin
Yes, South American (e.g., Peru, Columbia, etc.)
Yes, North American (e.g., Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, etc)
Yes, Central American (e.g. Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, etc.)
